meanings.definition: A crustacean of the order Schizopoda.
meanings.sent1: The schizopod scuttled along the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of schizopods in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The schizopod wore tiny sunglasses to protect its eyes from the sun.
meanings.sent4: In the world of the ocean, the schizopod is like a tiny explorer.
meanings.sent5: Children love learning about the fascinating schizopod with its unique features.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of schizopods.
meanings.sent1: The researcher made detailed notes on the schizopod anatomy.
meanings.sent2: Her artwork depicted the beauty of the schizopod world.
meanings.sent3: The schizopod dance was a hit at the underwater party.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a schizopod, always exploring new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the sunset reflected the schizopod hues of the ocean depths.
